document_data.name: Spotted Lion
document_data.mainbody:
'''Spotted lions''', also called '''cave lions''', were a species of large, plains-dwelling [[cat]] closely related to the [[lion]].

{{quote|When it comes to infiltrating giant steadings, I must admit that spotted lions are in some ways preferable to, say, [[dire wolves]] or [[cave bear]]s. Namely, if they're well fed, they're more likely to stretch and yawn than they are to raise an alarm when they spot you.|Bigby}}
document_data.Description:
Spotted lions resembled regular lions, but were said to be 30% to twice again as large. Their distinctive dappled fur was dusky, as was the mane, with charcoal-grey spots.
<!--==Behavior==
document_data.Ecology:
This species lived on warm, open plains, but was rare outside of "lost world" regions. Otherwise, their diet and social habits were akin to those of the common lion. Including hunting in prides; they were known to take prey as large [[giant elk]] or even [[mammoth]]s.

Both [[stone giant|stone]] and [[cloud giant]]s were known to keep spotted lions as pets.

Spotted lions were among the felids that might be summoned by the spell ''[[pride of Nobanion]]''.<ref>
document_data.History: [[Fracto-Nimbuli]], a cloud giant in [[Chondath]], kept three pet spotted lions.
